```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rjson)
library(jsonlite)
library(RCurl)
```

```{r}
# get uv index hourly given zip code
zipbase_url <- "https://enviro.epa.gov/enviro/efservice/getEnvirofactsUVHOURLY/ZIP/"
zipfull_url <- paste0(zipbase_url, "95129/JSON")
zipfull_url
uvdatazip <- fromJSON(readLines(zipfull_url))
```
